HotelElement.Name: Wyndham Garden Hotel Times Square South

Description.Text: Wyndham Garden Hotel - Times Square South offers a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café. Business-related amenities at this 3.5-star property include complimentary wireless Internet access, complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, and a business center. Meeting facilities include conference rooms and meeting rooms for small groups. This property also offers a fitness facility, a concierge desk, and tour/ticket assistance.

• Madison Square Garden - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • New Amsterdam Theater - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Macy's - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Times Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Toys 'R' Us Times Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Broadway - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Empire State Building - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi • Central Park - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi • Ellis Island - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi • Statue of Liberty - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

Air-conditioned guestrooms at Wyndham Garden Hotel - Times Square South offer in-room safes (accommodate laptops), coffee/tea makers, and direct-dial phones. Beds feature premium bedding. 32-inch high-definition televisions come with premium cable channels. Complimentary wired and wireless high-speed Internet access is provided along with cordless phones, free local calls, and complimentary newspapers. Bathrooms include showers, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Welcome amenities, climate control, and clock radios are also included. Microwaves, refrigerators, and a turndown service can be requested. Housekeeping is provided.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply. • Golf - miniature • Ice skating • Swimming • Racquetball/squash • Aerobics • Running track/path • Basketball • Tennis • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Bicycle rentals • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing • Playground

Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is 12 PM

Direction to the property from airport - jfk: • start by going east towards airport exit/other terminals • take jfk expressway to i-678 north van wick expressway • merge onto grand central parkway west via exit 10. • take i-495/l.i.expressway exit 10e-w. merge onto i-495 • west via exit 10w. keep left at fork on ramp. • take queens midtown tunnel exit. • turn right onto e 34th st right onto 8th ave left onto 37th st. • left onto 9th ave • left onto west 36th st.
Wyndham Garden Hotel - Times Square South has a restaurant on site.
